title.narrative: Improving access to sustainable water, sanitation and hygiene

description.narrative: Clean water is the most fundamental need for a healthy life and this three-year project aims at targeting slum dwellers, in particular those who struggle to access decent water and sanitation due to poverty, unhygienic conditions and in particular costs associated which make such services out of reach. The ambitious project should transform the lives of 15,000 vulnerable men, women and children through the construction or renovation of water points; communal toilet facilities and bathing blocks; encouraging community ownership for operation and maintenance of the facilities; conduct hygiene promotion activities to support changes in behaviour attitudes and belief about hygiene and demonstrate to the local authorities how to design facilities which would be resistant to flooding.
